title: New Willie D. Davis Finance & Investment Laboratory allows students to invest in stocks with real money and see real results - UWGB
content: New Willie D. Davis Finance & Investment Laboratory allows students to invest in stocks with real money and see real results  UWGB
description: A new lab opening on the University of Wisconsin-Green Bay will give students access to the tools they need to become investment managers, including real money. The Willie D. Davis Finance & Investment Laboratory,...
